document.full_text: shares of toshiba corp jumped 4 percent on wednesday after a newspaper report that apple inc would invest in its production of small smartphone-use displays, dropping sharp from the running for that business in japan.
document.title: toshiba jumps on report chosen by apple for small lcds, sharp
lines_and_colors: shares of toshiba corp jumped 4 percent on wednesday after a newspaper report that apple inc would invest in its production of small smartphone-use displays, dropping sharp from the running for that business in japan.
